title: FSIS Issues Public Health Alert for Pork Due to Possible Salmonella Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, July 31, 2015 The U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) is issuing a public health alert due to concerns about illnesses caused by Salmonella that may be associated with pork products, specifically whole pigs used for pig roasts. FSIS was...
